vote.title: To Honor the 40th Anniversary of Katzinger's Delicatessen and Celebrate its Contributions to the City of Columbus
vote.description:
Title
 
To Honor the 40th Anniversary of Katzinger's Delicatessen and Celebrate its Contributions to the City of Columbus
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Katzinger's Delicatessen has been a beloved and cherished culinary landmark of German Village since its establishment in 1984; and
 
WHEREAS, for four decades, Katzinger's has enriched the historic charm and vibrant atmosphere of German Village, attracting residents and visitors alike with its authentic New York-style deli experience; and
 
WHEREAS, generations of Columbus residents and visitors have savored Katzinger's delicious sandwiches, traditional Jewish specialties, and warm, inviting atmosphere, making it a beloved gathering place in the heart of German Village; and
 
WHEREAS, Katzinger's commitment to quality food and exceptional service has earned them a loyal following and numerous accolades, including recognition as "Best of the 'Bus" for Best Sandwiches by CityScene magazine; and
 
WHEREAS,  Katzinger's has demonstrated remarkable resilience and adaptability, navigating challenges and evolving to meet the changing needs of its patrons; and
 
WHEREAS, Katzinger's has become an integral part of the German Village community, fostering a sense of fellowship and tradition while contributing to the neighborhood's unique character and thriving culinary scene; now therefore
  
BE IT RESOLVED THAT THIS COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: Hereby extends its heartfelt congratulations to Katzinger's Delicatessen on the momentous occasion of its 40th anniversary.
